website_summaries.verdict: A bright solar-powered post lamp that you don't have to remember to turn on and off.
pros: Comes in black, white, and weathered bronze
Mounts to a pole, post, or wall
Solar-powered light that automatically turns on when it gets dark
Puts out a bright light thanks to its 10 LED bulbs that light to a combined 80 lumens
cons: Light may not last all the way through the night, especially if it didn't get much sun during the day

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are definitely worth the money. I hung them on the outside of my Tuff shed and they look and function quite well. After 2 days of charging in suboptimal conditions, I turned the lights on and was surprised at the brightness. Hopefully they stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but it only lasts 4 to 5 hours at most. Won't make it to midnight for sure. I have it in direct sunlight during the day here in Tucson, AZ!, and I have it on the warm setting which requires less power. I would not recommend this for someone looking for a reliable driveway/front of house lamp during the late night-time hours.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: This light will fool your neighbors in thinking it's powered by electricity but it isn't!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice combination solar light with a planter box at the bottom of the post. The solar light will stay on at night for over five hours during the winter and it gives off a nice amount of light. the only concern I see is how the planter box will need to be anchored down so the wind doesn't knock it down. Assembly was very easy, came with excellent instructions and I can't wait for warmer weather to come to add some springtime flowers! Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Nor'easter

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lights. It took some patience installing them onto my stone driveway piers but a masonry drill bit, the right drill and serious arm power did the trick. The bright white setting is more of a bluish "cool" white; quite pretty. Tomorrow I'm switching them to the warm white setting, though, which I'm guessing is more of a yellow white and would better match the yellow white light cast by my landscape lights. The light cast is more than sufficient and I am pleasantly surprised! Very nice product and satisfied customer. FYI: this picture was taken with my phone from from inside my house so it doesn't do the lights full justice. They're even brighter outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Start, Sad Finish
customer_reviews.text: It is build well, and has a great start in the evening, sadly it does not hold up throughout the night. When getting up late at night/early morning (before sunrise), it is already off/dead. At first I thought it was due to only being setup halfway through the day, andnot getting a full charge, but that turns out not to be the case. It only lasts half way through the night. I get better performance from the "cheaper" solar stakes lining the edge of my front yard than I do this more pricey lamp post. I am already looking for a replacement
customer_reviews.author: S. Siemer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Solar Porch Light
customer_reviews.text: I have a full front porch and have mounted them on the end post. They glow ill about 10PM as the lamps are not in full sunlight during the day. But in this retirement community we rool up the sidewalks at 10PM anyway. Quality contraction, easy to mount and a great addition to my home. I recommend without reservation. Bob O'Malley
customer_reviews.author: Robert OMalley

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the light
customer_reviews.text: Light has been installed for @2 years now. Installed very easy, looks nice. Used to add light the end of the driveway. It runs off of solar, not hard wired. Installed in full sun, has been running fine for the entire time. Light is still emitting for 6+ hours after the sun goes down. I would definitely buy another one if needed or when this dies.
customer_reviews.author: jhd4759

customer_reviews.title: The Final  Welcoming Touch
customer_reviews.text: GAMA SONIC GS-106FPW-W Baytown Lamp Outdoor Solar Light Fixture was prettier than the advertised picture. The instructions were clear and easy to follow. We did encounter some difficulty in mounting the light. the fault was not in the Lamp. the pole was a 1/8 inch too wide. The right equipment made the lamp sit right on the pole and it looks lovely. The light in the warm setting is not very bright, but the bight setting is sufficient to light the entrance to the driveway. We are happy with the Lamp atop the pole and it is nice to come down the drive and see it as a beacon saying "Welcome Home"!
customer_reviews.author: D. Stovell

customer_reviews.title: They work great, once the battery pack was replaced that was ...
customer_reviews.text: They work great, once the battery pack was replaced that was not with the light they both work outstandingly as advertised. Customer service was expeditious in sending the missing battery pack and arrived within 3 working days. Great Job
customer_reviews.author: James C Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this lantern, and that it's adjustable for bright white light vs warm white. It was easy for me to install to my garden fence corner post & it looks awesome while lighting my way in and out at night. It looks beautiful from a distance as well, and stays on well into the night. I'm bringing it in for the winter to help it last longer, but that was very easy since the back plate can just stay up and the rest comes off with the untwisting of a few screws. Very very well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: SweetDee7

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and functional lantern
customer_reviews.text: I would purchase these lanterns again! We bought two of the white powder coated lanterns. They have two settings for dim or brighter, light at night, look superb on the side of our house and for the price, simply can't beat the quality. Made of metal, with a replaceable heavy duty battery. They charged up the very next day and work beautifully nightly with a soft glow (on the low setting), but book readable light at night. I will buy these again in the future if we have another place to put more!
customer_reviews.author: ~Deb in Cleveland, GA

customer_reviews.title: Well made lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this light on my lamp post. Add a little Victorian warmth to your outdoors. This light is well made, solid, and has two different lights at the touch of the switch. For summer months I have it on warm more yellow light. When winter comes I’ll switch it to the brighter light. I love winter when I see snowflakes swirling around the lamp. I’ll wrap it in holly and a red bow for the Christmas holiday. This is a beautiful solar lamp and it puts out a lot of light.
customer_reviews.author: Bekka

customer_reviews.title: Functional and beautifully crafted
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this light! You cannot even tell that they are solar panel lights based on the amount of light they give out! They also look very nice compared to other similar lights on the market! Compared to my local hardware store these lights are marked 50% cheaper online! The only negative is that if you don't hang the light the most beautiful part of the structure is not used... so it seems like a waste. Wish they put more detail on the actual structure of the light vs one of the opinions. I purchaed 2 of them and placed it on my retaining wall.
customer_reviews.author: OUTLOOK

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with the output of this light
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the output of this light. Bought it more on a whim to try out with not much expectation. I tried it on the pole out front and figured if it didn't work well, I could use it out back more for looks than light. It is staying up front. Seems well made and was really easy to install. It looks good and I was a little surprised that the panes were actually glass in stead of plastic. The reflector does a good job and the light from the LEDs are spread pretty evenly.
customer_reviews.author: xxsxx

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp posy light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this solar lamp post light because it was a more affordable option than running electric to an existing lamp post. The light fixture looks great, is easy to install and overall I am very happy with the purchase. The brightness is not as bright as my neighbors electric lamp post. But for the price I paid, I am satisfied with the brightness of the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: William Ebel

customer_reviews.title: Barely Adequate, Short Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: October 2018 Update: After about 15 months of use the lights bare last for 2 hours and will be replaced with hard-wired lights. Don't waste your money! Fall 2017: The light provided by these lamps is barely adequate. I installed 2 of these for a friend and after less than 6 months the lights are not holding a charge and going out after 3 hours at the most.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived on time and was packaged well. It was very easy to assemble. However, the planter is made out of plastic and you will need to place something heavy in it to support the base. I placed a few large rocks and dirt which seems to be holding up. The light is bright and will shine for a few hours but needing to be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay on for more than 3 hours
customer_reviews.text: I've been testing this lamp for a little over 10 days and sadly the light won't stay on for more than 3 hours at night on the low brightness setting. I've followed the instructions about turning it off for a couple of days to let it charge but the results are the same. I live in Texas so we still have plenty of sunshine even during November. I wanted to give this lamp the benefit of the doubt, but for the price, I was expecting much better quality. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Not so happy...
customer_reviews.text: Loved them, easy to install, light is ideal and two settings mean you can have both warm and bright light. I used mine on pillars at front of house so used the pier mounting. All I needed was a masonry drill bit and that was that. They look great and arrived quickly. Highly recommend....update, now that the summer is over they are only staying lit for 2 hours, they are out by 6.30pm in the evening. Don't know if they are defective or just terrible in low light. I am in southern California so plenty of light during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights.
customer_reviews.text: We mounted these on the rock columns at our gate. We didn’t need bright lights up at the gate and these are really great for us. We have had them up for 6 years and they are still working! They don’t stay on all night or I would have given them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: 817_stew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful. I mounted these as my front entry lights, by my garage doors. As the lights on the front of my house, I couldnt be happier! Great light emission!!! I was worried with this being solar powered of having dull to no light, but its quite the opposite! Very pleased. 3 of my neighbors have now been told by their wives to buy something similar for their homes! Oops! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy & love energy efficient & environmentally friendly product! thank you for this wonderful solar outdoor lamp. It is not as super bright as the wired ones, yet It gives enough light, not so very bright but just enough to give the garage/front light so its not so dull and dark.
customer_reviews.author: Dinh K Vu

customer_reviews.title: Overall appearance is great but functionality is not so hot I installed it ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall appearance is great but functionality is not so hot I installed it on my porch in full sun light and it has yet to stay lit all night on overcast days it is out by midnight I was going to purchase 4 of these but with the $80 price tag and the poor performance I will be looking elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: G Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice post lamp
customer_reviews.text: This post lamp is made of metal not plastic like my last one. Very sturdy and well made. We added some cement to the base so it would never blow over, like our old one did all the time. It finally broke the light which is why we got this one. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: vkidd

customer_reviews.title: Good lighting
customer_reviews.text: This light works great. 2 light modes bright white and warm. Warm matches incandescent lights better. Looks great and shines all night. The spot I have it in gets sun light all day. I used to replace 120 volt hard wired light. Used same pole. No more timers.
customer_reviews.author: John Vezz

customer_reviews.title: Good value when you don’t have electricity
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install. The post itself is a bit wobbly if you don’t shim it. We buried over half of the planter to give it more stability during windy days. It is surprisingly bright. There is a warm light and white light setting. We set on warm light and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wright

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent solar lamp. I installed it in October 2015. It stays on long, has a nice amount of light, looks fabulous on my mailbox. I get so many complements on this. My neighbor is looking to buy this now too. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mymess2

customer_reviews.title: would've spent my money on something better...
customer_reviews.text: the light is pretty bright and it was the height i was looking for but there were some problems with it 1) its BADLY CROOKED! no matter how you assemble it, the post is NEVER straight. i will have to buy some vine plants and hopefully it wraps around it and no one will notice that it leans. 2) the nut that holds the light fixture to the base becomes loose, so you have to open it up and tighten it. not so bad, but kind of annoying. 3) its just cheaply made. with it being 140 or so dollars, you think you would get something that looks good, but its just crappy metal with cheap spray paint on it.
customer_reviews.author: amberlgay

customer_reviews.title: Let it charge for a few days.
customer_reviews.text: It was going to be a real pain digging up and replacing the original wiring for our outdoor light so I decided to try this light. My son installed it for me but didn't leave it off for two days as recommended so it lit one night but not again. I turned it off for three sunny days and it is working fine unless it's a super cloudy day then it isn't on very long if at all. I'm ok with that as I hated the continuous unlit lamppost I had. It's also very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Rozanski

customer_reviews.title: So much better than an electric lamp post
customer_reviews.text: This Lamp Post is exactly what I wanted for my front yard. It looks so cute and really works. The solar lamp is so much better than having to run wires for an electric lamp post and it gives you the same effect. We did put rocks in the bottom to keep it a little more stable and it has stayed in place for the past month. If your looking to brighten up your front yard this is definalty the solar lamp post to do it with.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great looking / well made lamps
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of the solar lamps and mounted them on the posts at either side of the entrance to our horse farm. They look absolutely awesome on the black posts/fence and we've had many nice comments. The only issue is that they don't stay on all night, but I'm sure they will when we get into the longer summer days which will charge the batteries for longer.
customer_reviews.author: AmeriSAbritt

customer_reviews.title: I have nothing but good things to say about this product
customer_reviews.text: I've had three of these lights now for over a year. I have nothing but good things to say about this product. They were very easy to install and the directions were exceptionally easy to follow. The lights are still bright and come on every evening at dusk as long as they get five to six hours of sunlight. The reflective interior takes a bit of getting used to, since there is no regular light bulb. But all in all, the design is attractive. The price has gone down since I purchased them over a year ago. And I plan on ordering a few more.
customer_reviews.author: fredi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Purchase d Nov 2018 for front of home. Builder not only didn't put any lighting but no wiring either. I purchased these and was amazed at how easy they were to install. They look good in the daylight as well as when they're lit. Not really bright but that is my choice due to the setting I chose. They do give the home a pleasant curb appeal at night. Still working and I haven't touched them since I installed them. They do stay lit thru the night here in Tx. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Love these solar light!
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice! I cannot get electricity to my attached garage but wanted a working carriage light. These do not look like solar lights when they are lite up. They look like real electricity powered lights. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution when the wiring that runs underneath the ground ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution when the wiring that runs underneath the ground to our lightpost went bad. Instead of digging up a good portion of the yard...ordered one of these.....and it is awesome. Very attractive and provides plenty of light all powered by the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Lighting
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and for solar it is bright. Face it, if you’re wanting to light up the entire driveway you might as well run electric to your pole but if you want a nice elegant light to illuminate the area enough to see your way around the driveway or sidewalk and not do a face plant over the bushes, these are great
customer_reviews.author: G650 pilot

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, good light but after having 3 other ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, good light but after having 3 other solar lights of similar size and price but different manufacture, I was very disappointed on how long they stay on. I have had them for over a month now and this time of year I'm only getting about 4 hours of light out of the battery. They are on my gates of the farm and there is no shade whatsoever so they are getting all the sunlight they need for charging. I Have some other solar lights that still stay on for 10 hours or more after 3 years and with the original batteries. I will not be buying any more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ko••••ar
customer_reviews.text: bought 3 gama sonic solar lights , 2 came not a problem the third , rattling in box parts moving inside light, beveled glass is not in the spots it should be , gaps , put together shabbily, cost too much money to have to fix myself . not sure I would recommend , have not placed outdoors as of yet as may be returning if I cannot fix what a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M. Glantz

customer_reviews.title: easy, 20 min install
customer_reviews.text: installed on our brick mail box today. it is just gorgeous. easy, 20 min install., we love it and it added loads of style from one product to our front yard. great curb appeal! buy it! it will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MARTY

customer_reviews.title: Bright! Nice. I’d recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This light is bright, goes in the ground fast and is very sturdy. No need fo any attachment to hold it into the ground. Very nice produce.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: The are not only beautiful in the pic but stunning in person
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely swear by these lights! The are not only beautiful in the pic but stunning in person. This was my first one purchased in white, but I have replaced all of the black fixtures on the outside of my house and patio with them as well. I love how versatile this product is. You can literally use it on lamp posts, paver patios, columns, porches, etc. and it just brings a level of elegance.
customer_reviews.author: LDN

customer_reviews.title: Additional lighting
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were pictures only. Post is all aluminum and areas near the threads were not painted. Understandably, you can not paint threads as it would not twist together easily, but needed better alignment so no paint lines. Lamp is not as bright as I hoped. Its okay. It took 3 days for full charge of solar batteries and lamp to light up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it got brighter but I love the look
customer_reviews.text: Love the lights but they aren’t as bright as some of the pictures here Although, it does the what I need at least. If you don’t want to wire this is your best option. Looks nice on my home
customer_reviews.author: JASON

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Nice feature to have two colors. I just wish it lasted all night. Comes on at 8 pm and off by one. I have cheap Home Depot solar landscape lights that last all night long. Not worth the 120$ just my opinion
customer_reviews.author: stephen a. thul

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This lamp post comes in 4 sections which screw into collars to reach the full height. When assembled snugly each section is a few degrees off of straight with the prior section. Noticeable but not horrific. Also the four inch cross pieces that jut out of the head assembly are not parallel to the ground. Again noticeable but not outrageous. The light itself is adequate and lasts well into the night. I would recommend this lamp with cautions.
customer_reviews.author: MacMook

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp but dangerous packing!
customer_reviews.text: While I have not had full use out of it yet, the lamp looks nice and is pretty sturdy for the price. My biggest issue now is the shipping. When I opened the box I almost cut myself on a razor blade that was left in there. I'm not sure what it was doing in there. But extremely disappointed and concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: just don't hold a charge for entire evening..disappointed ...they are not cheap. My neighbors have less expensive ones that stay lit all nite...have to make a change.....
customer_reviews.author: sam vaiana

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I really like the light has both a "normal" and LED setting. I prefer the LED and does a great job of lighting up my front yard at night. The style is great and installation was only a couple of screws.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: For a Solar light, this really is a nice option when you're having electrical issues with a pole light. We had several electricians try to fix our underground wiring, when I finally decided to go the Solar route. It's not as bright as a standard blub, and cloudy days mean no light that night, but otherwise this is a good product. Easy to install, with directions that are helpful.
customer_reviews.author: PA Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Bright idea!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an old gas lamp in front of the house that no longer worked. I painted the existing 3" pole black and screwed this kit on. Works great and is brighter than anticipated. A great, no fuss solution.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: In the picture the Gama lights are on my house ( not hardly on after a Full day of sun) the post light to the left is shining bright—( this was a purchase from Rural King for 1/2 the cost of a Gama light.) Called Gama and they said the lights are not properly situated to charge. Funny thing the cheaper lights are doing just fine. Unsatisfied for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noticeably Brighter than Previous Solar Lamp Post Light
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a simlar Gama Sonic light post light that had dimmed then quit working after several years with this one. It is fairly new yet, but so far much brighter and I prefer the design over my previous version. I have high hopes for this and hoping it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: TaharaDancer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome solar light!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome solar light..put in in front of my two door garage..looks awesome..throws out alot of light..love that its solar operated.great buy
customer_reviews.author: jitz

customer_reviews.title: The light looks great! The only glitch I had was that the ...
customer_reviews.text: The light looks great! The only glitch I had was that the planter part arrived broken, however the replacement was sent to me in a about 48 hours. I would recommend this product. The only change that I would make is that they use a more durable product for the planter part of the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Year two and its still looking great and working
customer_reviews.text: year two and it's still working great (I store it indoors during the winter months)
customer_reviews.author: Joe A.

customer_reviews.title: Super solar lamp for the PNW.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these several years ago. So satisfied with these that I bought two more this year. Replaced batteries in original lights as I noted the new lights were staying lot longer and a bit brighter. Easy to replace batteries and replacement cost dry reasonable through local hardware store. Great product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Olmsted

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but I wouldn't say it lights up the area around the post very well.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this lighted lamp post. I want to purchase more in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Vallee L Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the lights
customer_reviews.text: The lights just are not as bright as I thought they would be and they don’t stay lit. sometimes they’re just dark
customer_reviews.author: Diva3482

customer_reviews.title: Gives more of a glow like a nightlight in the yard
customer_reviews.text: Works but lighting seems low even on high. Maybe because I'm in Washington state but does not cover near as much of the front yard as a normal lines post light. Gives more of a glow like a nightlight in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice!
customer_reviews.text: These lights work wonderfully....if you are looking for some pretty outside lights and don't want to mess with the wiring, these are a good choice. They were easy to install and they put off a nice soft night light. Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Blackmore

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Made & Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: 5 Star Outstanding Service and these are metal with beveled glass not plastic!!! Very heavy & well made! Just stunning and huge too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Goulart

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but, lights don't stayed on all night
customer_reviews.text: These solar lamps look very nice but, they don't stayed on all night. sometimes they don't even turn on at all. If i could go back I would buy a wired lamp instead
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: More than we were expecting in a lamp
customer_reviews.text: Bought this porch light to use for our tiny cabin we are building. It’s a very beautiful lamp ...it’s amazing that it’s actually solar. Much brighter than we were expecting too. It’s in a temporary location right now but when we are done building we will add a second one on the other side of the door as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda De Groot

customer_reviews.title: Faint light
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it except that is not bright enough thereby defeating the purpose of what it’s supposed to accomplish—illuminate my walkway.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Bright and beautifully lit up yard
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace our old gas lamp post for years... This was the perfect option! It lights up my whole driveway and half my yard every night! It is truly beautiful and worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna olsen

customer_reviews.title: This is a fairly nice light. It is easy to install as no ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly nice light. It is easy to install as no electric wires need to be ran. If you have a day without really bright sun then expect this light to either not come on the next night or come on only for a very short time. This light could be greatly improved if they had means to turn it on/off/dim from the outside of the lamp. It needs a weatherproof switch on the outside. Currently you have to disassemble the lamp to change the setting and that is inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Would like to see a longer on time at night
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is not as long as advertised. There are plenty of mounting accessories and parts. Would like to see a longer on time at night. My lights face full sun most of the day, they do not stayblit t night the 8-10 hrs advertised
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: These shine all night long!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect these lights to shine for so many hours! They are set to the highest setting, but still they last just about 'til dawn. Amazing. I bought five for column post lights. It's great they have every type of mount so you are all set no matter how you are going to use these.
customer_reviews.author: AEBJP

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and lights well
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to put along the side yard to light the walkway. They are very bright and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Markus Meier

customer_reviews.title: Awesome solar
customer_reviews.text: Put these lamps on granite post in driveway and very please with brightness and longevity of light. Come on at dusk and are still just as bright with dawn a breaking. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: The lights could be a little brighter. However, they are very well made, and a very nice looking light. I have received several compliments from the neighbors already.
customer_reviews.author: Brf7

customer_reviews.title: excellent warm light
customer_reviews.text: We really like the light pattern. Bought it to light up a shadowy area at night and this did a great job. Flower is a great addition. Put some heavy rocks in and dirt on top.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Welcoming glow.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted on an old light post that needed rewiring that would have been difficult. It's very attractive and although it does not cast a bright light, the soft glow is welcoming, warm and says "We're home" as it comes on reliably when the sun goes down.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lights
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my pool deck. Light is perfect and they stay lit all night with full sun daylight
customer_reviews.author: Ralph I. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for the entry of our business as we have no power where they needed to go. Sometimes they work, most the time they don't even if they have 8+ hours of sun. When they do work they are very dim. They are pretty, but that's about all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Johnson

customer_reviews.title: VERY pleased and Surprised
customer_reviews.text: We love these lights. Solar lighting was the only way we could go for our driveway. They put off a lot of light and we were VERY pleased and surprised at how bright they really are at night. Right now we get about 8 hour of light they com on about 7pm and off by 4ish. We are fine with that as they more than met our needs. in the photo most of the light is coming from the lights
customer_reviews.author: Jami-lynn Burvainis

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting a little better quality but overall its good
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent unit. I was expecting a little better quality but overall its good.
customer_reviews.author: Slammer

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it's super easy to install and setup
customer_reviews.text: This would of been a 5 star but the base for the lamp post install is made of cheap plastic. It cracked when I tightened it down. Other than that it's super easy to install and setup. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Connors

customer_reviews.title: A very pretty lantern. The LED light could be brighter it ...
customer_reviews.text: A very pretty lantern. The LED light could be brighter it has a blue shine to it; so in the dark I know which pole lamp is mine when driving home in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright light which uses solar energy
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright light which uses solar energy. It's at our home in FL and it's so nice not to have to replace bulbs. We mounted it on the old pole which housed the electric wires. Just screw on top and you are ready to go. Neighbor noticed it and liked it and I ordered one for him as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mapster

customer_reviews.title: broken part.
customer_reviews.text: i bought two of them and i recieved today. it looks nice wall lamp but one of them was broken it may broken easely
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, easy to install, works as advertised. Would definitely recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Baytown Solar Lights
customer_reviews.text: We love these lights! They are as big and heavy as wired lights. They look great on either side if our garage!
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Lights and Supplier
customer_reviews.text: The lights were delivered promptly, well packaged with no damage. Being solar powered, they were simple to install with no need for an electrician. Each light has 4 solar collectors, one on each side. They look good and work great, casting plenty of light on the warm setting. They're strong, not flimsy feeling or looking like the plastic ones we've seen. We've received many compliments from the neighbors since installing these lights.
customer_reviews.author: David Orris

customer_reviews.title: It does need direct sunlight for as long as possible ...
customer_reviews.text: It does need direct sunlight for as long as possible during the day. The more sunlight, the longer it glows.
customer_reviews.author: Bon-bon

customer_reviews.title: Nice light, could be brighter
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks nice. Just wish it was brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the setting to switch it to soft white for ...
customer_reviews.text: Brighter than most solar lights. Love the setting to switch it to soft white for my pit area.. that was the key selling point. Seems so far to be of solid quality and holds a charge well into the night. Not sure exactly when it even shuts off. Definitely later than I'd be having a bonfire.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Stroup

customer_reviews.title: Love these! They have two different types of light
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They have two different types of light, a bright light and a soft light. They were easy to mount and look beautiful. My only complaint is that the switch to change the light is on the interior and you need to take the light apart to open and adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good looking lamp
customer_reviews.text: This post lamp looks great in the front yard. I live in California and the light stays on all night. It has to light setting which I set to high.
customer_reviews.author: Dave...

customer_reviews.title: Worthless!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not bright at all. it must be that i would have to live in the desert or live near the sun for it to charge sufficiently. And, it is only bright for a very small period of time. Maybe 1-2 hours at most. Waste of money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James M. Eisenmann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well built, puts out more light than I expected, just waiting to see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Henslee

customer_reviews.title: Don't work consistently
customer_reviews.text: They look great and function when they are working. 3 of 4 work. Then the last time I looked after a partly cloudy day and very dark night, the forth one worked and the other 3 didn't. Say whaaaat?
customer_reviews.author: Raystrib

customer_reviews.title: This light makes my back yard look very nice at night
customer_reviews.text: This light makes my back yard look very nice at night, it also puts out lot of light. Probably buy one for the front yard.
customer_reviews.author: kevin singleton sr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and produces the level of light we ...
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations. Easy to install and produces the level of light we sought. May not satisfy everyone's personal ideas about the level of light.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Kramer

customer_reviews.title: worked 2 nights then stopped
customer_reviews.text: followed directions and it worked just fine for 2 nights but never turned on again? have a replacement already and I'm letting it sit in the sun for 2 days (as stated in the instructions) and will see how this one works. Otherwise it was nicely made and was very sturdy and easy to attach to my gas light pole......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great first impression but
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of this light. They worked okay to begin with. Now one of them does not work at all (it's been only couple months)....very disappointed. Hopefully I can get it to work again...maybe it was weather; it's been cloudy and rainy for few days and daylight time is getting shorter each day but the other one still works fine though...ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love be it, only negative is light turn on only about 5 hours or less.
customer_reviews.author: pandagame

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing. The compartment for the rechargeable battery was ...
customer_reviews.text: Parts missing. The compartment for the rechargeable battery was empty and no loose battery was found in the box, and the two nuts that fasten the top to the bottom also missing. The lamp is unusable at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. It was easy to install on my brick column and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie N.

product_meta.title: Gama Sonic GS-106FPW-B Baytown Lamp Outdoor Solar Light, Pole Pier & Wall Mount Kits, Black
product_meta.description: Size:Lamp Only| Color:BlackThe Gama Sonic Baytown Solar Lamp GS-106FPW-B is the perfect energy-saving and money-saving replacement for electric or gas-powered outdoor lighting. Constructed of rust-resistant cast aluminum with a powder-coated black finish, this outdoor solar powered light includes three different mounting options: a post mount, pier/flat mount, and wall mount, giving you the flexibility to choose the best application for your outdoor solar light (post not included). No electrical wiring is required, just be sure to place the solar light in a spot with direct sunshine. The replaceable Lithium-ion battery pack is good for about 1,000 charges (roughly 3 years) and charges when sunlight hits the fixture's integrated solar panels. At dusk, the solar powered lights 10 LEDs will automatically turn on at a brightness of 80 lumens in either a bright-white or warm-white color temperature for up to 8 hours on a full battery. The outdoor solar lamp includes integrated monocrystalline silicon solar panels are protected by weather-resistant, cleanable tempered glass that helps ensure long-lasting reliability. A sunny day without overcast should be sufficient to provide a full recharge. Recharging speed will vary based on weather conditions, but no charging will occur if direct sun does not shine on the panels. Do not locate the solar powered light in a shaded area. For any product questions or unexpected issues with your Gama Sonic product, our support team at our Atlanta headquarters is here to help. Note: For warranty claims, contact Gama Sonic USA customer support by phone at 1-800-835-4113 from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Eastern time or by e-mail at support@gamasonic.com.
feature_bullets: SOLAR POWERED- This outdoor solar powered light is powered completely by the sun and equipped with an internal lithium-ion battery pack, which charges when sunlight hits the device’s solar panel.

THREE MOUNTING OPTIONS – This versatile solar landscaping light comes with the accessibility to mounting the unit as an outdoor wall sconce, on flat surfaces such as pillars or columns or at the top of a 3-inch outside diameter lamp post (post not included).

DUAL LIGHT COLOR TEMPERATURES: Our Baytown Solar Lamp comes with the flexibility to choose between bright-white or warm-white LEDs with just a flip of a switch. Set the color temperature to your preference and the solar outdoor light will automatically turn on at dusk and off at dawn.

NO ELECTRICAL WIRING – This outdoor solar light is perfect for DIY enthusiasts looking to upgrade their landscape lighting while not breaking the bank. Installation is simple and takes minutes and does not require electrical wiring, just place in a spot with direct sunshine.

LOW MAINTENANCE – This solar powered light requires little to no maintenance. Once the solar light has been installed in a spot with direct sunshine, leave the rest up to the sun. The only maintenance required is an occasional wipe of the solar panel with a damp cloth.. Dimensions: 8.5x 8.5 x 17.Battery Capacity:1500 mAh

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
